about.summary: Flexible HDF5 saving/loading library forked from deepdish (University of Chicago) and maintained by the Portugues lab

name: flammkuchen
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "flammkuchen" %}
{% set version = "0.9.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e9aab9b229ace70d879b85618a9ce0e88dd6ce35d4dbcdfd60c6b61c33a1b4fb

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.5
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - pytables

test:
  imports:
    - flammkuchen

about:
  home: https://github.com/portugueslab/flammkuchen
  license: "BSD-3-Clause"
  license_family: "BSD"
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Flexible HDF5 saving/loading library forked from deepdish (University of Chicago) and maintained by the Portugues lab'
  doc_url: https://github.com/portugueslab/flammkuchen
  dev_url: https://github.com/portugueslab/flammkuchen

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hadim
